#summary El objeto navigator contiene información acerca del navegador y el entorno del cliente.
[NavigatorObject English]

== Propiedades ==

  * [EsNavigatorAppCodeNameProperty appCodeName]
  * [EsNavigatorAppMinorVersionProperty appMinorVersion]
  * [EsNavigatorAppNameProperty appName]
  * [EsNavigatorAppVersionProperty appVersion]
  * [EsNavigatorBrowserLanguageProperty browserLanguage]
  * [EsNavigatorBuildIDProperty buildID]
  * [EsNavigatorCookieEnabledProperty cookieEnabled]
  * [EsNavigatorCpuClassProperty cpuClass]
  * [EsNavigatorLanguageProperty language]
  * [EsNavigatorMimeTypesProperty mimeTypes]
  * [EsNavigatorOnLineProperty onLine]
  * [EsNavigatorOscpuProperty oscpu]
  * [EsNavigatorPlatformProperty platform]
  * [EsNavigatorPluginsProperty plugins]
  * [EsNavigatorProductProperty product]
  * [EsNavigatorProductSubProperty productSub]
  * [EsNavigatorSecurityPolicyProperty securityPolicy]
  * [EsNavigatorSystemLanguageProperty systemLanguage]
  * [EsNavigatorUserAgentProperty userAgent]
  * [EsNavigatorUserLanguageProperty userLanguage]
  * [EsNavigatorUserProfileProperty userProfile]
  * [EsNavigatorVendorProperty vendor]
  * [EsNavigatorVendorSubProperty vendorSub]

== Métodos ==

  * [EsNavigatorJavaEnabledMethod javaEnabled()]
  * [EsNavigatorRegisterContentHandlerMethod registerContentHandler()]
  * [EsNavigatorRegisterProtocolHandlerMethod registerProtocolHandler()]
  * [EsNavigatorTaintEnabledMethod taintEnabled()]
